post:
We're back LET and we've got some fresh new offers coming out of our Miami and Los Angeles locations.

Lots of things have happened at anyNode since we last posted here. We've since opened our Miami location, upgraded our LAX location and worked hard to upgrade existing clients experience and platform. We run our own network in each location and provide BGP sessions and allow BYOIP on all dedicated servers. 

All orders are manually verified and can take up to 24 hours. Dedicated servers will also take up to 48 hours to be provisioned, unless otherwise stated.

KVM 

KVM2G-256
* 1 shared CPU core
* 256MB RAM
* 10GB SSD storage
* 500GB bandwidth @ 1Gbit

Order: [LAX ](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=165)- $15/year
Order: [Miami ](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=166)- $12.50/yr

KVM2G-512
* 1 shared CPU core
* 512MB RAM
* 15GB SSD storage
* 500GB bandwidth @ 1Gbit

Order: [LAX ](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=164)- $3/mo or $30/yr 
Order: [Miami ](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=169)- $2.50/mo or $25/yr


KVM2G-1024
* 2 shared CPU cores
* 1GB RAM
* 25GB SSD storage
* 1TB bandwidth @ 1Gbit

Order: [LAX ](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=160)- $5/mo or $50/yr 
Order: [Miami ](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=162)- $5/mo or $50/yr

Larger plans are available but outside of LET pricing rules.

Miami dedicated servers

Supermicro X11-32GB-1x1TB
* E3-1230v5
* 32GB DDR4 ECC RAM
* Samsung 1TB SSD (can be replaced with a 4TB HDD, please open a ticket after order)
* 30TB @ 1Gbit

[Order here](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=196) - $75/month - 7 Available

Supermicro X11-16GB-1x1TB
* E3-1230v5
* 16GB DDR4 ECC RAM
* Samsung 1TB SSD (can be replaced with a 4TB HDD, please open a ticket after order)
* 30TB @ 1Gbit

[Order here](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=198) - $70/month - 1 Available 

Supermicro X9-16GB-4x1TB
* E3-1230v2
* 16GB DDR3 ECC RAM
* 4x1TB HDD
* 10TB @ 1Gbit

[Order here](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=172) - $50/month - 1 Available 

Supermicro X9-16GB-4x1.5TB
* E3-1230
* 16GB DDR3 ECC RAM
* 4x1.5TB HDD
* 10TB @ 1Gbit

[Order here](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=175) - $55/month - 1 Available

Supermicro X10-32GB-2x120GB
* E3-1231v3
* 32GB DDR4 ECC RAM
* 2x120GB SSD
* 20TB @ 1Gbit

[Order here](https://billing.anynode.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=199) - $65/month - 8 Available - Up to 72 hour deployment
